body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--021abf342d371248e50ceaed478a90ca-->
### Reviews
See [the guideline](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#code-review) for information on the review process.
A summary of reviews will appear here.
<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#bitcoin-core/gui/754](https://github.com/bitcoin-core/gui/pull/754) (Add BIP324 "Transport" label to peer details by hebasto)
* [#bitcoin-core/gui/747](https://github.com/bitcoin-core/gui/pull/747) (Open fully encrypted wallets by achow101)
* [#28450](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28450) (WIP: Add package evaluation fuzzer by instagibbs)
* [#28391](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28391) (refactor: Simplify CTxMempool/BlockAssembler fields, remove some external mapTx access by TheCharlatan)
* [#28368](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28368) (Fee Estimator updates from Validation Interface/CScheduler thread by ismaelsadeeq)
* [#28335](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28335) (RFC: Remove boost usage from kernel api / headers by TheCharlatan)
* [#28333](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28333) (wallet: Construct ScriptPubKeyMans with all data rather than loaded progressively by achow101)
* [#28331](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28331) (BIP324 integration by sipa)
* [#28251](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28251) (validation: fix coins disappearing mid-package evaluation by glozow)
* [#28246](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28246) (wallet: Use CTxDestination in CRecipient instead of just scriptPubKey by achow101)
* [#28202](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28202) (Silent Payments: receiving by josibake)
* [#28201](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28201) (Silent Payments: sending by josibake)
* [#28142](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28142) (wallet: Allow users to create a wallet that encrypts all database records by achow101)
* [#28122](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28122) (Silent Payments: Implement BIP352 by josibake)
* [#27865](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/27865) (wallet: Track no-longer-spendable TXOs separately by achow101)
* [#27827](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/27827) (Silent Payments: send and receive by josibake)
* [#27601](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/27601) (wallet: don't duplicate change output if already exist by furszy)
* [#27596](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/27596) (assumeutxo (2) by jamesob)
* [#27351](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/27351) (wallet: add `seeds` argument to `importdescriptors` by apoelstra)
* [#27307](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/27307) (wallet: track mempool conflicts with wallet transactions by ishaanam)
* [#27286](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/27286) (wallet: Keep track of the wallet's own transaction outputs in memory by achow101)
* [#27260](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/27260) (Enhanced error messages for invalid network prefix during address parsing. by russeree)
* [#27052](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/27052) (test: rpc: add last block announcement time to getpeerinfo result by LarryRuane)
* [#26840](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/26840) (refactor: importpubkey, importprivkey, importaddress, importmulti, and importdescriptors rpc by KolbyML)
* [#26728](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/26728) (wallet: Have the wallet store the key for automatically generated descriptors by achow101)
* [#26711](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/26711) (validate package transactions with their in-package ancestor sets by glozow)
* [#26008](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/26008) (wallet: cache IsMine scriptPubKeys to improve performance of descriptor wallets by achow101)
* [#25907](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/25907) (wallet: rpc to add automatically generated descriptors by achow101)
* [#25273](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/25273) (wallet: Pass through transaction locktime and preset input sequences and scripts to CreateTransaction by achow101)
* [#22838](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22838) (descriptors: Be able to specify change and receiving in a single descriptor string by achow101)
* [#22341](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22341) (rpc: add getxpub by Sjors)
* [#20892](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/20892) (tests: Run both descriptor and legacy tests within a single test invocation by achow101)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
